FuncDef: The display mac-address aging-time command displays the aging time of MAC address entries.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the aging time of MAC address entries is configured using the mac-address aging-time command, to check the aging time, run the display mac-address aging-time command.
Precautions
If MAC address entries do not age, the aging time is displayed as 0 seconds.
If the aging time of MAC address entries in a VSI is set, the aging time configured in the VSI takes effect.
If the aging time of MAC address entries in a VSI is not set, the global aging time of MAC address entries takes effect.
